thread.section_title: Vacatia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vacatia | www.vacatia.com
thread.title: Diane Bodtker

author: Diane Bodtker
title: Diane Bodtker
text: Vacatia's website and online chat made booking our hotel easy and fun. They have a great selection of hotels to choose from with detailed descriptions, TripAdvisor reviews, great photos of the hotel rooms and amenities, and even floor plans of the different rooms. The Fantastic suite at the W South Beach in Miami was even better than expected. We had an amazing time and will definitely book through Vacatia on our next trip.
